title: Pixel 4a microphone won't work during video calls.
content:
Have tried uninstalling and reinstalling apps such as WhatsApp, zoom, duo, etc. Did a soft reset. Removed the sim and re-inserted it. Finally did a factory reset. Nothing seems to have worked so far. 

Funny that the mic works for voice calls, assistant and capturing videos. 

My pixel is less than a year old.
